tab1.title1: Welcome to a chill PvP server!
tab1.text1:
We're here to have fun, not repeat the toxicity of ASE. The goal is for raiding and open world PvP to be fun again! 

Please read through the rules as we will hold players to them. 

Grab a starter pack from White drops and start grinding!

tab2.text1:
G1. Green Ob is a no PVP zone, you can do your boss fights there. Any admin-built structures are off-limits. Impersonating admins in any form will result in a ban.

G2. No Human, Humano, Survivor, 123, 321 or other dumb names (make a new character if needed). Tribe names required and must be named appropriately (no racism, slurs, bunch of numbers, special characters, etc).

G3. No cheating, meshing, or other exploits.

G4. No abuse of ORP settings.

G5. Be kind to new players, don't chase them off. No picking/dropping or attacking them/their dinos. If they're on or around the beaches, consider them "new".

G6. This is a chill PvP server and we expect everyone to treat each other with respect. Shit talking is fine, toxic players/behavior will not be tolerated. We're here to have fun, not repeat the toxicity of ASE.

tab3.text1:
B1. No building on/near major resources, artifact caves, notes, obelisks, boss areas/arenas, rare/unique dino spawn zones or nests, drops, other bases, or player spawn zones.

B2. ONE base and ONE outpost per tribe. Turrets/dinos can only be at your base or outpost and cannot be restricting access to areas mentioned in B1.

B3. Clean up ALL traps, starter bases, rafts, temp builds, FOBs (within 24hrs), etc. Infinite pickup is enabled, please utilize it and help reduce server lag/load times!

B4. No structure spam. Anti-FOB spam can only be placed up to 40 snapped foundation spaces away from your base entrance and cannot be excessive.

B5. No dino builds covering the body (must be able to be shot/killed).

tab4.text1:
R1. No team raiding - you can only raid with your tribe (allies disabled). Tribe members have to be a part of your tribe for a minimum of 24 hours before they can participate in a raid.

No repetitive/back-to-back raiding of the same tribe to the point where it becomes toxic.

No popcorning during raids (either side, in any form). Be a good sport!

No trapping players inside their base or FOBs with turrets/structures/dinos or building into another tribes base; tribes must be able to physically exit and rebuild defenses.

No harpoon, cannon, ballista, or magmasaur raiding.

tab5.text1:
<TextStyle.LightBlue>Ini Header:</>

\[WBUI2]


INI-Options:

JsonURL="url"  -  default: "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DC-Modding/WBUI2-Wiki/main/default.json"

You have to host the file as "raw" somewhere and enter the URL to it wrapped in " ". You can use github (linked below). After uploading the file you'll find a button called "raw". click the button and copy the URL. Or use any other hosting site which offers linking to a raw JSON output.

For a more detailed instruction checkout the Wiki linked down below.


You can trigger an update of the JSON via console command:
cheat scriptcommand WBUI2 update
tab5.text2:
OpenButton  -  0/1/2/3/4/5/6, default:0, 0=F1, 1=F2, 2=F3, 3=F4, 4=F5, 5=Delete, 6=Home  -  Determines the button the player needs to press to open the UI.

HideIcon  -  true/false, default: false  -  If true the Icon in the bottom left corner vanishes after some time.

HideIconAfter  -  integer, default: 60  -  Determines after how many seconds the Icon vanishes.

IconURL  -  "URL", default: "https://i.imgur.com/OZ6xOjY.png"  -  You can upload a custom image somewhere (e.g. imgur, link down below) and it will be used as the Icon in the bottom left.

DisableIconText  -  true/false, default:false  -  If true the text "F1 for Info" will not be displayed.

IconPosition  -  0/1/2/3, default:0, 0=Top Left, 1=Top Right, 2=Bottom Right, 3=Bottom Left  -  Set the position of the Icon.

IconTextColor  -  0/1/2/3/4/5/6/7/8, default:0, 0=Light Blue, 1=Red, 2=Green, 3=Blue, 4=Yellow, 5=Orange, 6=Violet, 7=Black, 8=White  -  Sets the color of the "F1 For Info" text.

OpenOnStart  -  true/false, default: true  -  If true the UI will open automatically after the player spawned.

OpenOnStartOnlyNewPlayers  -  true/false, default: true  -  If true the UI only opens automatically the first time the player spawns on the server.

UpdateInterval  -  integer, default: 12  -  This value determines the time in hours the mod automatically pulls the JSON from the URL to update settings.

GENERAL INFORMATION:


For the rest of the settings pls checkout the Wiki or the example JSON linked down below.

In order to pass the JSON-validation you have to use "*backslash*n" without a space to generate newlines. although the mod should handle regular newlines just fine.

Special characters like " have to be escaped with a *backslash*

You can trigger an update of the JSON via console command: "cheat scriptcommand WBUI2 update"

Be careful with the file size of the images. The user have to download the images.
